Package: org.jlab.analysis

[Groovy] Class Parser

    • org.jlab.analysis.Parser 
    • @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

      Encapsulates most of the command line parsing and messaging for the Analysis class.

      Version:
      1.0
      Authors:
      Matthew McEneaney

        • protected boolean parse(java.lang.String[] args, Analysis analysis)

          Parse and evaluate command line arguments (or lack thereof). Returns true if main has enough correctly formatted arguments to run smoothly. You will probably want to customize this for less general analyses.

          Parameters:
          args - Command line arguments
          analysis - Analysis for which to parse command line arguments
          Returns:
          Boolean flag

        • protected boolean version()

          Print out author, contact, version, etc.

          Returns:
          Boolean flag
